Edges-Revenant -- Male Human Legendary Revenant
Attributes (14 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d10 Strength: d10 Vigor: d12+1
Attribute Notes: Strength Of The Dead: +1 Spirit Step/+1 Vigor Step
Skills (20 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d6 Healing: (sma) d6 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Stealth: (agi) d8
Faith: (spi) d8 Notice: (sma) d6 Taunt: (sma) d4
Fighting: (agi) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Gambling: (sma) d6 Persuasion: (spi) d6
Skill Notes:
Relentless Tracker: +2 Survival (tracking) vs. revenge target and regains trail after 2d6 hr if lost
Zombie Master: Successful Intimidation vs. Spirit gives control of mindless skeletons and zombies until the end of the encounter
Size: 0
Advances: 16 Improvement Points: 36 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 18; Edge: 10; Skill: 8
Features
Edges (7 points): Death Touch; Detachable Parts; Relentless Tracker; Revenant; Stench; Thought Eater; Zombie Master Hindrances: Hesitant; Poverty; Vengeful+ Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Revenant: Has Ageless, Hardy, Rage, Regeneration (Slow), Strength Of The Dead, Undead, and Vengeance features
Vengeance: Has Vow+ feature
Ageless: Does not age
Detachable Parts: May detach and remotely control (up to 1 mile) body parts/May regrow destroyed body parts
Poverty: Starts with half funds and loses half of funds each wk
Thought Eater: Gains memories from eating a fresh brain
Vengeful+: Seeks revenge by any means
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Combat
Parry: 8 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 12 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Flak Jacket Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Chainsaw (2d6+4); Holy Water Spray (None R1"); SAW (2d8 R30" AP 2); Unarmed (d10+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +3 Parry
Undead: +2 Toughness
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Death Touch: Touch inflicts d10+d4 damage vs. living; d10+2d6 vs. vengeance target
Hardy: Does not suffer a Wound from a second Shaken result
Hesitant: Uses the lowest of 2 Action Cards
Rage: May spend a Benny to gain supernatural powers 1/session; suffers a major psychosis afterward (Spirit-2 neg)
Regeneration (Slow): May attempt a natural healing roll 1/dy
Stench: Smell inflicts Distracted on adjacent creatures
Undead: +2 Shaken recovery/Takes no additional damage from a Called Shot/Ignores 1 point of Wound penalties/Doesn't breathe/Immune to disease and poison
